name: Manga & Anime Coloring Pages for Adults & Kids

description:
Free anime coloring book for adults and kids. Manga coloring game! Relaxation and color therapy! Coloring pages for kids and adults! Paint mandala with manga coloring book - girls and other designs! Draw anime faces and fill them with colors! Create virtual kawaii manga girls! Love comic books and cartoon movies? Interested in Japanese culture? Draw and paint big manga eyes. Fill with colors anime characters! Anti-stress coloring app with free fun artworks! Create and relax! This coloring app/game for kids and adults lets you unleash creativity, relieve stress and doodle all you want! Color switch is easy now! Use palettes of colours! Fun games for free with “Manga & Anime Coloring Book”! If you need a kawaii coloring game for kids and adults with anime - it’s the right game! If you need to get rid of stress - it’s the right game! Relax, unwind and learn to draw manga with “Manga & Anime Coloring Book”. Be creative - all you need is your imagination. Tons of high quality images and drawings (including sketches). Frequently updated! Draw an anime face, use avatar maker and paint your virtual anime / manga girl. Use your mandala & manga kawaii art for wallpaper or share it with your friends! Intuitive interface. Color switch, palette change and other features are easy!
Colory of the Japan world!

Draw almost ecchi drawings. Game for shonen, josei and seinen audience! No yaoi and yuri! Imaginary harem. No hentai, just sexy lineart girls. Cosplay and fan service! Color the cute catgirl. Make her your new waifu! Are you an otaku? This coloring app is perfect for you and your fandom friends! Color moe girl, no yuri and yaoi! Japanese culture linearts carefully prepared for otaku - shounen, josei and seinen fans. No annoying chibi characters! Color cosplay 2D girls in ecchi style. Color your favourite moe girl in a cafe! Learn how to paint scanlation! One of the best otaku games! If you like the cute moe girls and ecchi, then this game is going to be your next waifu app! All kinds of girls: tsundere, kuudere, dandere, yandere, shojo, nyandere etc. Based on japanese drawing style! Color your own kawaii 2D girlfriend and future waifu! Learn how to draw manga step by step in coming soon feature! Paint like real mangaka! For Shonen and Shojo addicts!

Notice me senpai! Our otaku game offers:
- Over 50 images and patterns
- Experiment with beautiful palettes
- Designed for adults but kids and little girls can also enjoy the coloring experience
- Game works offline! No WiFi needed to relax with the best coloring book.
- New images and pictures every week!
- Simply tap to pick the color and paint
- Lots of beautiful illustrations and drawings to color
- Personalized color palettes
- Easy to save your work and share it with all your friends
- You can save different versions of your artwork for the same sketch and revisit later!
- Pinch to zoom in/out, easy coloring!

Not interested in manga coloring book? Try our other games with these themes:

- Mandala
- Floral
- Animals
- Orient
- Africa
- Asia
- Butterflies
- Fairy tale
- Sea world
- Music instruments
- Japan


You can pick a color palette, a picture and theme depending on your mood today. Spring, summer, winter, and autumn colors! The best stress relief app!
